rows.label: qev055301_MSG0001
rows.name:
When facing a new challenge or preparing to embark
on a new endeavor, do you ever sense the whispers of
the will within you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0002
rows.name:
To put the question in more human terms,
do you ever get "gut feelings"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_JNK0010
rows.name: Partially Agree

rows.label: qev055301_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you act on your gut on rare occasions.

rows.label: qev055301_JNK0020
rows.name: Completely Agree

rows.label: qev055301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that all of your actions come from the gut.

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0003
rows.name: Hmm, I see. As a rule, the Orphe favor logic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0004
rows.name:
But in the most crucial of times, we have relied instead
upon the will of the Ovah within us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I see. If you were an Orphean, you would no doubt be
in close communication with the Ovah inside you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0006
rows.name:
I have felt the presence of senirapa water deep in
Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0007
rows.name:
That knowledge is clearly a gift from my Ovah.
For as long as we have that water, the Orphe survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I fear I must go to Noctilum at once.
I would ask your assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thank you. My preparations are complete,
save two missing ingredients for the rations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Three pieces of Logunie's driftwood and four heads of
sadelana lettuces must be found before I can depart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Nnh... Exhaustion is setting in.
The Ovah within me has begun to recede...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I must find the water while I still have the Ovah's
guidance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Three pieces of Logunie's driftwood and four heads of
sadelana lettuces must be found before I can depart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0014
rows.name:
I am told one must travel as far as Arendt Bridge in
northern Primordia to harvest Logunie's driftwood.
Please hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh, it is you. I fear I was half asleep.
It seems the strength of my Ovah is...ebbing.
If you have what I requested, please give it to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0016
rows.name: Fine work. I knew I could depend upon you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0017
rows.name: Now I must hurry to Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_JNK0030
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev055301_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer to accompany Kun'luarb.

rows.label: qev055301_JNK0040
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev055301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Kun'luarb if he has a weapon for the road.

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thank you, but I wish to focus all my energies on
hearing the voice of my Ovah. And for that,
I must be alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0023
rows.name:
I have what I require. I wish to focus all of my energies
and concentration on hearing the voice of my Ovah.
Extraneous equipment would only inhibit that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055301_MSG0024
rows.name: I leave at once for Noctilum.[ST:wait ]
